type,
nowVersionNum,
versionNum,

mapper.update:
update sys_version
versionName = #{versionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nowVersionNum = #{nowversionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
versionNum = #{versionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
androidState = #{androidstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iosState = #{iosstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
androidUrl = #{androidurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iosUrl = #{iosurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
versionDesc = #{versiondesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_version set versionName = #{versionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nowVersionNum = #{nowversionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionNum = #{versionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, androidState = #{androidstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iosState = #{iosstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, androidUrl = #{androidurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iosUrl = #{iosurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, versionDesc = #{versiondesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
select
,
from sys_version order by createTime desc limit 1
